body: OK, it seems the three groups of output variables, **zoneComfortMetric**, **comfortMapVariables** and **surfaceTempAnalysis** need to be specified to use the **microclimate map analysis** component.  And, without outputting **zoneEnergyUse**, the csv file can be reduced significantly ... from 50MB to 3.7MB! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/QSAjpdZCfl1ddpUVtytJtIhMVKxAdyw1ef3SpaYK5DyVS3miYVuk8T7tmYiVZP14FyhF9cBgCliPwiGb70QbsdqzqMQUGCvk/3.PNG)
